English Sentences: O LORD God of Israel, thou art righteous: for we remain yet escaped, as it is this day: behold, we are before thee in our trespasses: for we cannot stand before thee because of this.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, Israa7eela Xoossau, neeni xillo. Nu naaquwaappe denddidaagan nuuppe issoinne ne sinttan eqqanau danddayennaagaa gidikkonne, nuuni zerettau palahidi attidaageeti hachchi hagan ne sinttan de7oos" yaagaas.

English Sentences: Now when Ezra had prayed, and when he had confessed, weeping and casting himself down before the house of God, there assembled unto him out of Israel a very great congregation of men and women and children: for the people wept very sore.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iziri Xoossaa Beeta Maqidasiyaa sinttan kunddidi yeekkiiddi woossiyo wodenne nagaraakka paaxiyo wode, Israa7eela asaappe daroi, maccai, attumainne naatoi ubbai akko shiiqidi, misho yeehuwaa aara yeekkidosona.

English Sentences: And Shechaniah the son of Jehiel, one of the sons of Elam, answered and said unto Ezra, We have trespassed against our God, and have taken strange wives of the people of the land: yet now there is hope in Israel concerning this thing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Elaama yara gidiya Yihi7eela na7ai SHakaanee hagaadan yaagiis; "Nuuni ha biittan de7iya Aihuda gidenna maccaasata machchido gishshau, nu Xoossaassi ammanettibookko. Gidikkonne, qassi Israa7eelassi ha77ikka hidootai de7ees.

English Sentences: Now therefore let us make a covenant with our God to put away all the wives, and such as are born of them, according to the counsel of my lord, and of those that tremble at the commandment of our God; and let it be done according to the law.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau ta godau, neeninne nu Xoossaa azazuwaassi yayyiyaageeti zoridoogaadan nuuni ha maccaasatanne etappe yelettida naata ubbaa yeddanau nu Xoossaara maacettoos. Hagee ubbai higgee giyoogaadan poletto.

English Sentences: Arise; for this matter belongeth unto thee: we also will be with thee: be of good courage, and do it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha yohuwaa nuuni waati oottanaakko, nuna kaalettanaagee ne ooso gidiyo gishshau, dendda! Minna! Nuunikka nena maaddana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then arose Ezra, and made the chief priests, the Levites, and all Israel, to swear that they should do according to this word. And they sware.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Iziri denddi eqqidi, halaqata, qeeseta, Leewatanne Israa7eela asaa ubbaa ha geetettidaagaadan oottana mala caaqissiis; etikka caaqqidosona.

English Sentences: Then Ezra rose up from before the house of God, and went into the chamber of Johanan the son of Eliashib: and when he came thither, he did eat no bread, nor drink water: for he mourned because of the transgression of them that had been carried away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Iziri Xoossaa Beeta Maqidasiyaa sinttaappe denddidi, Eliyaashiba na7ai Yahohanaani de7iyo kifiliyaa geliis. Gelidi kumetta qammaa omooduwaappe simmida asatu nagaraassi yeekkiiddi aqido gishshau, he sohuwan qumaa mibeenna; haattaakka uyibeenna.

English Sentences: And they made proclamation throughout Judah and Jerusalem unto all the children of the captivity, that they should gather themselves together unto Jerusalem;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, omooduwaappe simmida asai ubbai Yerusalaame shiiqana mala, Yihudaa ubbaaninne Yerusalaamen awaajuwaa awaajjidosona.

English Sentences: And that whosoever would not come within three days, according to the counsel of the princes and the elders, all his substance should be forfeited, and himself separated from the congregation of those that had been carried away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha heezzu gallassatu giddon he sohuwaa shiiqenna ooninne de7ikko, au de7iyaabai ubbai appe ekettanaadaaninne ikka omooduwaappe simmida galchchaappe shaahettidi yedetettanaadan halaqatinne cimati kuuyidosona.

English Sentences: Then all the men of Judah and Benjamin gathered themselves together unto Jerusalem within three days. It was the ninth month, on the twentieth day of the month; and all the people sat in the street of the house of God, trembling because of this matter, and for the great rain.
Wolaitta Sentences: He geetettida heezzu gallassati wurennan de7ishin, uddufuntta aginan laatamantta gallassan Yihudaanne Biniyaama asai ubbai Yerusalaame shiiqidosona; shiiqidi, ha deexo yohuwaappenne wolqqaama iraappe denddidaagan kokkoriiddi, Xoossaa Beeta Maqidasiyaa sinttan de7iya dabaaban uttidosona.

English Sentences: And Ezra the priest stood up, and said unto them, Ye have transgressed, and have taken strange wives, to increase the trespass of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Uttidaashin qeesee Iziri denddi eqqidi, eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Aihuda gidenna maccaasatuppe machchota ekkidi naaqqideta; he gaasuwan Israa7eela asaa naaquwaa kaseegaappekka yaa darissideta.

English Sentences: Now therefore make confession unto the LORD God of your fathers, and do his pleasure: and separate yourselves from the people of the land, and from the strange wives.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i intte nagaraa GODAASSI, intte maizza aawatu Xoossaassi paaxite; i dosiyoobaakka oottite. He biittan de7iya Aihuda gidenna asatuppenne Aihuda gidenna intte machchetuppe shaahettite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then all the congregation answered and said with a loud voice, As thou hast said, so must we do.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin he sohuwan shiiqida galchchai bantta cenggurssaa xoqqu oottidi, hagaadan yaagidosona; "Neeni nuuyyo yootidoogaadan nuuni oottanau bessees.

English Sentences: But the people are many, and it is a time of much rain, and we are not able to stand without, neither is this a work of one day or two: for we are many that have transgressed in this thing.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin asaa qoodai cora; irainne wolqqaamidi bukkees. Yaaniyo gishshau, nuuni iraappe attiyoosi bainna sohuwan hagan eqqi agganau danddayokko. Qassi nuuni ha yohuwan keehippe naaqqido gishshau, hagee issi gallassan woi naa77u gallassan giigiyaabaa gidenna.

English Sentences: Let now our rulers of all the congregation stand, and let all them which have taken strange wives in our cities come at appointed times, and with them the elders of every city, and the judges thereof, until the fierce wrath of our God for this matter be turned from us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, ha shiiqida asaa sunttan nu halaqati Yerusalaamen takkidi, koshshiyaabaa oottona. Ha yohuwaappe denddidaagan Xoossaa wolqqaama hanqqoi nuuppe simmana gakkanaashin, nu katamatun de7iya Aihuda gidenna maccaasata machchida ubbai keerido wodiyan Yerusalaame yona; qassi he katamatu cimatinne pirddiyaageetikka etaara yona" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Only Jonathan the son of Asahel and Jahaziah the son of Tikvah were employed about this matter: and Meshullam and Shabbethai the Levite helped them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaaheela na7ai Yonaataaninne Tiiqiwa na7ai Yaahizaayi eta qofaa phalqqidosona; qassi Mashulaaminne Leewa gidiya SHabbataayi phalqqiyaageeta maaddidosona.

English Sentences: And the children of the captivity did so. And Ezra the priest, with certain chief of the fathers, after the house of their fathers, and all of them by their names, were separated, and sat down in the first day of the tenth month to examine the matter.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, omooduwaappe simmida asai he giidoogaadan oottidosona. Qeesee Iziri ubba zaretuppekka halaqata dooridi, ubbaakka eta sunttan sunttan xaafiis. Tammantta aginan koiro gallassan halaqati yohuwaa qori xeellanau doommidosona.

English Sentences: And they made an end with all the men that had taken strange wives by the first day of the first month.
Wolaitta Sentences: Koiro aginan koiro gallassai gakkiyo wode, Aihuda gidenna maccaasata machchida asata ubbaa qoridi wurssidosona.

English Sentences: And among the sons of the priests there were found that had taken strange wives: namely, of the sons of Jeshua the son of Jozadak, and his brethren; Maaseiah, and Eliezer, and Jarib, and Gedaliah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihuda gidenna maccaasatuppe machcho ekkidaageeti hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaageeta. Qeesetuppe: Yoxedeeqa naata gidiya Yaasunne a ishanttu yaraappe Ma7iseeya, El77eezara, Yaariibanne Gadaaliyaa.

English Sentences: And they gave their hands that they would put away their wives; and being guilty, they offered a ram of the flock for their trespass.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti bantta Aihuda gidenna machchota yeddanau caaqqidosona; qassi bantta naaquwaa gishshau, wudiyaappe issi dorssa orggiyaa naaquwaa yarshsho oottidi yarshshidosona.

English Sentences: And of the sons of Immer; Hanani, and Zebadiah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Imeera yaran Aihuda gidenna machchota ekkidaageeti Hanaananne Zabaadiyaa.

English Sentences: And of the sons of Harim; Maaseiah, and Elijah, and Shemaiah, and Jehiel, and Uzziah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hariima yaratuppe Ma7iseeya, Eelaasa, SHamaa7iyaa, Yihi7eelanne Ooziyaana.

English Sentences: And of the sons of Pashur; Elioenai, Maaseiah, Ishmael, Nethaneel, Jozabad, and Elasah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Paashihuura yaratuppe Eliyoo7enaaya, Ma7iseeya, Isimaa7eela, Nataani7eela, Yozabaadanne El77aasa.

English Sentences: Also of the Levites; Jozabad, and Shimei, and Kelaiah, (the same is Kelita,) Pethahiah, Judah, and Eliezer.
Wolaitta Sentences: Leewatuppe: Yozabaada, SHamaa7iyaa, Qaliixa giyo Qelaaya, Pataahiyaa, Yihudaanne El77eezara.

English Sentences: Of the singers also; Eliashib: and of the porters; Shallum, and Telem, and Uri.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mazamuriyaa yexxiyaageetuppe: Eliyaashiba. Penggiyaa naagiyaageetuppe: SHaaluuma, Xelemanne Uura.

English Sentences: Moreover of Israel: of the sons of Parosh; Ramiah, and Jeziah, and Malchiah, and Miamin, and Eleazar, and Malchijah, and Benaiah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi hara Israa7eela asaappe: Par77oosha yaratuppe Raamiyaa, Yizziyaa, Malkkiyaa, Miyaamiina, El77aazara, Malkkiyaanne Banaaya.

English Sentences: And of the sons of Elam; Mattaniah, Zechariah, and Jehiel, and Abdi, and Jeremoth, and Eliah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Elaama yaratuppe Mataaniyaa, Zakkaariyaasa, Yihi7eela, Abdda, Yiremootanne Eelaasa.

English Sentences: And of the sons of Zattu; Elioenai, Eliashib, Mattaniah, and Jeremoth, and Zabad, and Aziza.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zattu yaratuppe Eliyoo7enaaya, Eliyaashiba, Mataaniyaa, Yiremoota, Zabaadanne Aziiza.

English Sentences: Of the sons also of Bebai; Jehohanan, Hananiah, Zabbai, and Athlai.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bebaaya yaratuppe Yahohanaana, Hanaaniyaa, Zabbaayanne Atilaaya.

English Sentences: And of the sons of Bani; Meshullam, Malluch, and Adaiah, Jashub, and Sheal, and Ramoth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baana yaratuppe Mashulaama, Malluuka, Adaaya, Yaashuuba, SHa7aalanne Yiremoota.

English Sentences: And of the sons of Pahathmoab; Adna, and Chelal, Benaiah, Maaseiah, Mattaniah, Bezaleel, and Binnui, and Manasseh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Paahati-Moo7aaba yaratuppe Adinaaha, Kalaala, Banaaya, Ma7iseeya, Mataaniyaa, Baxaali7eela, Biinuyanne Minaasa.

English Sentences: And of the sons of Harim; Eliezer, Ishijah, Malchiah, Shemaiah, Shimeon,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hariima yaratuppe El77eezara, Yishiyaa, Malkkiyaa, SHamaa7iyaa, SHim77oona,

English Sentences: Benjamin, Malluch, and Shemariah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biniyaama, Malluukanne SHamaariyaa.

English Sentences: Of the sons of Hashum; Mattenai, Mattathah, Zabad, Eliphelet, Jeremai, Manasseh, and Shimei.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hashuuma yaratuppe Matanaaya, Mataata, Zabaada, Elifeleexa, Yeremaaya, Minaasanne SHim77a.

English Sentences: Of the sons of Bani; Maadai, Amram, and Uel,
Wolaitta Sentences: Baana yaratuppe Ma7idaaya, Amiraama, U7eela,

English Sentences: Benaiah, Bedeiah, Chelluh,
Wolaitta Sentences: Banaaya, Bediyaa, Kaluuha,

English Sentences: Vaniah, Meremoth, Eliashib,
Wolaitta Sentences: Waaniyaa, Maremoota, Eliyaashiba,

English Sentences: Mattaniah, Mattenai, and Jaasau,
Wolaitta Sentences: Mataaniyaa Matanaayanne Yaa7isa.

English Sentences: And Bani, and Binnui, Shimei,
Wolaitta Sentences: Biinuya yaratuppe SHim77a,

English Sentences: And Shelemiah, and Nathan, and Adaiah,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHeleemiyaa, Naataana, Adaaya,

English Sentences: Machnadebai, Shashai, Sharai,
Wolaitta Sentences: Makinadabaaya, SHashaaya, SHaraaya,

English Sentences: Azareel, and Shelemiah, Shemariah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Azaari7eela, SHeleemiyaa, SHamaariyaa,

English Sentences: Shallum, Amariah, and Joseph.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHaaluuma, Amaariyaanne Yooseefa.

English Sentences: Of the sons of Nebo; Jeiel, Mattithiah, Zabad, Zebina, Jadau, and Joel, Benaiah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nabo yaratuppe Yi7i7eela, Matiitiyaa, Zabaada, Zabiina, Yaddaaya, Yuu7eelanne Banaaya.

English Sentences: All these had taken strange wives: and some of them had wives by whom they had children.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti ubbati Aihuda gidenna machchota machchidaageeta. Issooti issooti harai atto naatakka yelidosona.
